name: .LB File Extension
summary: Learn about .LB files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by Lens Blur, an application that enables the user to apply Bokeh effects to images; contains a project, which consists of an image, customized effects, and any project settings.

content: Bokeh is the aesthetic quality of a photograph that is out-of-focus. It is similar to a "Gaussian" blur that can be applied using image editing applications, such as Adobe Photoshop.
NOTE: NexusHubs Lens Blur has been discontinued.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
